content.raw:
If I move a part using the translate and rotate tools while the inspector is open, the link's pose is updated in real time, which is really cool.

It would be great if the visual and collision scales also updated as they're being scaled. Currently this happens:

1) Insert a box, open the visual inspector - geometry shows as box with x == y == z == 1

2) Scale the box with the scaling tool, the box properly rescaled, but the inspector is not updated.

3) Press apply on the inspector, the box goes back to the unit size.

If you open the inspector after scaling, the updated value shows up though.
